page.title: 04WARGRAVE CHURCH AND A PEER
page.content: {THE PARISH CHURCH } The bells of St. Mary's Church are rung by ringers of all ages. The choir welcomes young people as well as adults. There are four house groups which meet twice a month to share a meal and fellowship, an active Sunday School and a youth group. I arrived from the USA eight months ago and I already feel I completely belong. {A WARGRAVE PEER Lord Remnant's grandfather was the first Baron and it is an hereditary title.His wife is The Lady Remnant and his children have courtesy titles of "The Honourable".Being Patron of Wargrave Church means having the right to choose the Vicar.The Lady Remnant chairs several committees while Lord Remnant is an accountant in London.He works with Prince Charles on the Jubilee Trust and received a C.V.O.
